titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller (Nelson A.) Gubernatorial records,Audiovisual materials, Series 39
A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller Gubernatorial records, Audiovisual materials, Series 39 FA756

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-03-30 00:00:33 -0400.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller Gubernatorial records, Audiovisual materials, Series 39

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The contents of this series collection has been separated from other archival holdings. As such, the description of any individual item, or set of items, may also currently appear, in some form, in the finding aid for the originating collection.
Future processing, description, and presentation of Films will seek to address this issue as much as feasible.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view films -- please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1902).
If the item does not have a designated AV number, please refer to the Title and the Film Number (which consists of a combination of Roman numerals and alphanumerics - example: III 14.1-6).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those that are not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Audio and video pertaining to NAR's gubernatorial and political career.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in 2 series by file type.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: All inquiries to view films require advanced notice of at least 48 business hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those that are not available in modern formats, may require creation of an access surrogate. Applicable charges will apply.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Footage from campaigns, conventions, and official events that are specifically related to political activities in the life of NAR. Many dozens of campaign commercials, including TV and radio spots.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Many dozens of campaign commercials, including TV and radio spots, are included in the NAR collection but have recieved only basic processing. â€“ see Special Formats staff for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A newsreel compilation from 1958 of Nelson A. Rockefeller gubernatorial footage. Includes footage of Nelson A. Rockefeller in New York City at a reception for his gubernatorial campaign, Dwight D. Eisenhower arriving in New York City, Nelson A. Rockefeller and Dwight D. Eisenhower in 5th Avenue parade, John D. Rockefeller 3rd with Senator Keating, construction of the Interfaith Center, Nelson A. Rockefeller family portrait, President Eisenhower with Nelson Rockefeller, Nelson A. Rockefeller and David Kennedy, Nelson A. Rockefeller campaiging in Glen Falls, New York. Nelson A. Rockefeller and wife visiting Venezuela. Nelson A. Rockefeller in Albany, New York at swearing in ceremony and celeration. Mrs. Nelson A. Rockefeller and Nelson sewing union labels on clothing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Based on the book by Theodore H. White, this documentary film follows the campaigns of Nixon and JFK during the 1960 presidential election, with news footage of Nelson Rockefeller, Hubert Humphreys, and others. Produced by David Wolper for ABC News.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Titles include E-20-15 LEADERSHIP; E-20-16 ECONOMIC GROWTH; E-20-17 EQUAL OPPORTUNITY; E-20-18 FOREIGN POLICY.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: ALSO SEE III 14.1 Fa 81 (AV 1232); COMPILED ON ONE REEL WITH AV #1232-1234.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Campaign film produced during the 1963 gubernatorial race. Includes brief 'life history of NAR and footage of him at Princeton, Rockefeller Center, and in Latin America. scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Political film produced by the Republican National Finance Committee before the 1966 election. Discusses domestic and international issues that have been caused by the Democratic majority in the U.S., with sound bites from Eisenhower, Ford, Nixon, Gov. Rockefeller, and others.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Compilation of 31 political ads from 1966 campaign, ranging from 10 to 60 seconds each. Topics include: Pure Water Program, state scholarships, the Bureau of Consumer Protection, Medicaid, the narcotics reform laws, education, minimum wage, air pollution, and a message from Jacob Javits.
